content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you! I'm sure you will find my apartment quite comfortable and ideally located for your needs. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was hoping that you could offer me a discount. The apartment is unfurnished, so I would need to buy furniture, which will already cost me a lot of money. Additionally, I am a responsible and dependable person, so I would take good care of your apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're a student and might be on a tight budget, Farhad. However, I must be honest with you. I have several other potential tenants interested in this apartment, and I'm looking to get the best price possible. I'm willing to negotiate, but I cannot guarantee a discount. Could you please give me an idea of what you think is a fair price for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you have other options, but I am a serious candidate. I can offer 500 euros per month for the apartment. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards, and I want to be on good terms with you. I am also responsible and dependable. I appreciate your understanding.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, your offer of 500 euros per month is certainly a starting point for our negotiation. However, I must remind you that this is a prime location in the city center, with all amenities nearby. The apartment is also brand new and will provide you with a comfortable living space. Given the current market rates and the demand for such apartments, I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the property. How does 750 euros per month sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 euros per month is quite high for me as a student. I appreciate the quality of the apartment, but I cannot afford that price. I can offer 550 euros per month, which is still a considerable amount for me. I am willing to rent the apartment under this condition. I appreciate your understanding.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I hear your concern, Farhad, and I appreciate your willingness to pay 550 euros per month. However, I must maintain a fair price for the apartment. How about we find a middle ground? If you can offer 650 euros per month, I think that would be a fair reflection of the value of the apartment and your financial situation. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 650 euros per month is a better price, but it is still high for me. I can offer 600 euros per month. This is the highest amount I can pay for the apartment. I appreciate your understanding.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, your offer of 600 euros per month is very close to my asking price of 650 euros. I'm willing to accept your offer under one condition: you must sign a one-year lease agreement. This will give me the security of long-term rental and will allow me to offer you the discounted rate. Would you be willing to commit to a one-year lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 600 euros per month with a one-year lease agreement. I appreciate your understanding and fairness in this negotiation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could reach an agreement, Farhad. You have agreed to a fair price of 600 euros per month with a one-year lease agreement. I'm sure you will find the apartment a comfortable home during your stay in Munich. If you have any questions or need any assistance with anything, please let me know. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
